goal.en: Through seminars, experts will talk about the soft skills required for post-university, graduate schools, and even the workplace, including data collection, English thesis reading and writing, proposal writing, presentation skills, and other common functions, so that students can prepare for the next stage Prepare. It is expected that students can gradually apply what they have learned in the course, fully and clearly express the results of their special research, internship, and credit-taking courses, and effectively build the basic abilities of the next stage, such as document organization, expression, and communication, etc.
goal.ch: 本課程目標是希望透過專家以Seminar方式講述大學後期、研究所，甚至職場所需之軟實力，包括資料蒐集、英文論文閱讀與寫作、計劃書撰寫、簡報技巧、及其他共同職能等，讓學生為下一階段做準備。預期學生能在課程中逐步應用所學，完整且清楚的表達其專題研究、實習、修讀學分學程所獲得的成果，有效建置下一個階段的基礎能力如文件整理、表達溝通等。

content.en:
Invite industry experts and professors from various departments to give lectures, and the lecture include the following contents (contents may be revised):
1. Reference material collection and research tools
2. English paper reading and writing
3. Proposal writing skills
4. Presentation skills
5. Workplace Ethics
6. Autobiography and interview practice
7. Communication skills
8. Continuous learning
9. Interpersonal Interaction skills
10. Teamwork
11. Problem-Solving skills
12. Innovation ability
13. Job Responsibilities
14. Information Technology Applications
Students will join the “Interdisciplinary Seminar“ orally and in writing in the form of seminars.
content.ch:
本課程將邀請講師或各系教授進行授課，授課內容包含(以下內容依照講師邀請狀況動態修正)：
1.參考資料蒐集與研究工具
2.英文論文閱讀與寫作
3.提案/計劃書撰寫
4.簡報技巧
5.職場倫理
6.自傳與面試
7.溝通表達
8.持續學習
9.人際互動
10. 團隊合作
11. 問題解決
12. 創新
13. 工作責任及記錄
14. 資訊科技應用
最後學生將以研討會形式口頭、書面方式發表「跨領域成果」。
